description: Alpine or urban - wherever you are, cold is cold, and you need performance insulation designed for your environment. Worn as a standalone or midlayer and featuring a pullover design that gives a distinctive look, the Kole is an essential for city winters. Lofty and warm, the RDS-certified down fill is efficient and effective. The engineered woven baffles stretch to help you navigate crowded sidewalks, and stretch side panels blend wool and polyester for comfort and breathability.
name: Arcteryx Kole Down Pullover - Mens
